description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Jerry Jerome, ca. June 1947] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 161 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Jerome, Jerry, 1912- Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Saxophonists--1940-1950. Conductors (Music)--1940-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
